verbose_text: The use of Thp as a protecting group for the hydroxyl side chain in Fmoc-Ser / Thr-OH increased the solubility of the amino acid, which is consistent with our earlier reports.18 In order to determine the acid stability of Thp as a protecting group, Fmoc-Ser (Thp)-OH and Fmoc-Thr (Thp)-OH were studied under a range of acidolytic conditions.
evidence: Thp as a protecting group for the hydroxyl side chain in Fmoc-Ser/Thr-OH increased the solubility of the amino acid
